## Instructions

Create new repo with README (no gitignore or license)

Clone to computer by e.g. clicking on "Set up in Desktop"

Click clone and close GitHub Desktop for now

Change working dir to inside the folder or the folder above it (make tidy_pkg smart detect if it is in a folder with the same name as package)

Run tidy_pkg

Then go to GitHub desktop and click on publish to branch
